changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE ANSWERS ( EMPLOYEE_SURVEY_ID INT, QUESTION_ID INT, ANSWERS_TYPE ENUM('Employee', 'Manager'), ANSWER TEXT, PRIMARY KEY (EMPLOYEE_SURVEY_ID, QUESTION_ID), FOREIGN KEY (`EMPLOYEE_SURVEY_ID`) REFERENCES `EMPLOYEE_SURVEY`(`EMPLOYEE_SURVEY_ID`), FOREIGN KEY (`QUESTION_ID`) REFERENCES `QUESTION`(`QUESTION_ID`) );
